candylou com | instagram @candyloucreations twinkle toes baby blanket knitting pattern twinkle toes is a sweet and simple baby blanket designed with ease in mind the stitch pattern is rhythmic and calming with a subtle touch of sparkle that adds gentle interest without distracting from the softness of the blanket the result is a cozy practical piece that is both beautiful and timeless an ideal project for new knitters and a thoughtful gift for any baby skill level easy if you would like to see more of my patterns please visit my shops at ravelry and etsy needles us size 8 5 0 mm circular needles with at least a 24 or 32 cord with worsted weight yarn i always recommend using the needle size recommended on the yarn sleeve which may differ from us 8 gauge approx 4 5 stitches per inch in garter stitch when knitting a baby blanket exact gauge is not essential using a larger needle will yield a lighter airier blanket while a smaller needle will give you a denser smaller size also if you prefer to use a chunkier yarn or dk yarn that s just fine just change the needle to the size recommended by the yarn and choose 1 or 2 sizes larger for dk yarn and 1 or 2 sizes smaller for chunky to approximate the sizes given for worsted weight yarns yarn worsted weight yarn acrylic or superwash wool or wool blend recommended choose main color mc contrasting color cc and sparkly yarn assuming a
